trans-unit.source: Maintains run-time timing state for a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Opprettholder kjøretid tidsberegning tilstand for en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>, by itself, doesn't actually do anything other than describe a segment of time.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>, alene, faktisk gjør ingenting beskriver enn et segment tid.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>

trans-unit.source: It's the timeline's Clock object that does the real work: it maintains timing-related run-time state for the timeline.
trans-unit.target: Objektet er i tidslinjen klokken som gjør det reelle arbeidet: den opprettholder tidsrelatert kjøretid tilstand for tidslinjen.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, a clock is created automatically for your timeline.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller opprettes automatisk en klokken for tidslinjen.

trans-unit.source: When you animate by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> method, clocks are automatically created for your timelines and animations and applied to their targeted properties.
trans-unit.target: Når du animere ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>metoden klokker er opprettet for tidslinjer og animasjoner og brukes de angitte egenskapene automatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: For examples, see [How to: Animate a Property by Using a Storyboard](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Animate a Property Without Using a Storyboard](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Eksempler [slik: animere en egenskap ved å bruke en dreiebok](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [slik: animere en uten ved hjelp av en dreiebok](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also create a Clock explicitly by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CreateClock%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også opprette en klokken eksplisitt ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CreateClock%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CreateClock%2A>

trans-unit.source: In performance-intensive scenarios, such as animating large numbers of similar objects, managing your own Clock use can provide performance benefits.
trans-unit.target: Behandle klokken bruken kan gi bedre ytelse i ytelse mye scenarier, for eksempel animere stort antall lignende objekter.

trans-unit.source: Clocks are arranged in trees that match the structure of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> objects tree from which they are created.
trans-unit.target: Klokker ordnes i trær som samsvarer med strukturen i den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>objekter tre fra de er opprettet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>

trans-unit.source: The root clock of such a timing tree can be interactively manipulated (paused, resumed, stopped, and so on) by retrieving its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Klokken roten av slike et tidsberegning tre kan endres interaktivt (midlertidig stanset gjenopptatt, stanses og så videre) ved å hente den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>

trans-unit.source: Non-root clocks cannot be directly controlled.
trans-unit.target: Ikke-rot klokker kan ikke kontrolleres direkte.

trans-unit.source: Once created, a clock cannot be modified (but it can be manipulated).
trans-unit.target: Når du har opprettet en klokken ikke kan endres (men den kan redigeres).

trans-unit.source: Using a Timeline as a Timer A timeline's clock will only progress when there's an event handler associated with it or (in the case of an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> object) it is associated with a property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av en tidsplan som en tidtaker A tidslinje klokken vil bare pågår når det er en hendelsesbehandling tilknyttet eller (med en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>objektet) den er knyttet til en egenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: For this reason (and others), it's not recommended that you use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> as a timer.
trans-unit.target: For derfor (og andre) det anbefales at du bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>som en tidtaker.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> class, using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline*> as a template.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> class, ved hjelp av den angitte <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline*>som en mal.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> object has no children.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> objektet har ingen underordnede.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline*> from which this clock should be constructed. Clocks are not created for any child <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline*> objects, if they exist.
trans-unit.target: Den <> </> *> fra denne klokken skal genereres. Klokker opprettes ikke for alle underordnede <> </> *> objekter, hvis de finnes.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this clock has completely finished playing.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når denne klokken har fullstendig er ferdig med å spille.

trans-unit.source: If this clock is the root clock of a clock tree, it has completed playing after it reaches the end of its active duration (which includes repeats) and all its children have reached the end of their active durations.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne klokken klokken roten av et klokken tre, er fullført å spille når den har nådd slutten av varigheten aktive (som inkluderer gjentas) og alle underordnede verdier har nådd slutten av aktive varigheten.

trans-unit.source: If this clock is a child clock, it is considered to have completely finished playing when the root clock of the clock tree to which it belongs reaches the end of its active duration and all its child clocks have finished playing.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne klokken er en underordnet klokken, anses er fullstendig ferdig med å spille når den primære klokken i treet klokken tilhører når slutten av varigheten aktive og alle underordnede klokker er ferdig med å spille.

trans-unit.source: Stopping a clock does not trigger its completed event, but advancing it to its fill period does.
trans-unit.target: Stopper en klokken ikke utløser hendelsen fullført, men å flytte den til den Fyll perioden samsvarer.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"></xref> that can be used to start, pause, resume, seek, skip, stop, or remove this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"> </xref> som kan brukes til å starte, stanse midlertidig, gjenoppta, søker etter, Hopp over, stoppe eller fjerne denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Only root clocks can be interactively controlled.
trans-unit.target: Bare roten klokker kontrolleres interaktivt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"></xref> if this is a root clock; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController"> </xref> Hvis dette er en rot klokken; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rate at which the clock's time is currently progressing, compared to real-world time.
trans-unit.target: Henter hastigheten som pågår for øyeblikket av klokkeslettet, sammenlignes virkelige tid.

trans-unit.source: The rate at which this clock's time is current progressing, compared to real-world time.
trans-unit.target: Hastigheten som dette klokkeslettet er gjeldende fremdrift sammenlignes virkelige tid.

trans-unit.source: If the clock is stopped, this property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis klokken er stoppet, returnerer for denne egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the clock's speed is updated.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den klokkehastighet er oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: Pausing, resuming, reversing, accelerating, decelerating, seeking, stopping, or changing a clock's interactive speed using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> triggers this event.
trans-unit.target: Stans, gjenopptar, tilbakeføring, slik, seg, søking, stopper, eller endre en klokken for interaktive øke ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>denne hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Although this event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A> property becomes invalid, that doesn't necessarily mean the property changed.
trans-unit.target: Selv om denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>egenskapen er ugyldig, som ikke nødvendigvis egenskapen endres.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current global time, as established by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] timing system.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende globale tiden som er angitt i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tidsberegning system.

trans-unit.source: The current global time for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] timing system.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende globale tiden det [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tidsberegning system.

trans-unit.source: Get the current iteration of this clock.
trans-unit.target: Hent gjeldende gjentakelse av denne klokken.

trans-unit.source: A clock's first iteration has a value of 1.
trans-unit.target: En klokken første gjentakelse har verdien 1.

trans-unit.source: If this clock's timeline has an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A> setting of `true`, a full iteration consists of a forward-reverse pair, not just one of these segments.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne klokken tidslinjen har en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>at `true`fullstendig gjentakelse består av Videresend-snu to, ikke bare ett av disse segmenter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of its current iteration, seeking a clock returns its current iteration to 1.
trans-unit.target: Uavhengig av den gjeldende gjentakelsen returnerer søking en klokken den gjeldende gjentakelsen til 1.

trans-unit.source: Restarting a clock also returns its current iteration to 1.
trans-unit.target: Starte en klokken også returnerer den gjeldende gjentakelsen til 1.

trans-unit.source: This clock's current iteration within its current active period, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this clock is stopped.
trans-unit.target: Denne klokken gjeldende gjentakelse i den gjeldende aktive perioden eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis denne klokken er stoppet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current progress of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> within its current iteration.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende fremdrift for denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> i den gjeldende gjentakelsen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property indicates the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime%2A> normalized by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of this clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen angir de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime%2A>Normalisert av den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>av denne klokken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A clock that is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> has a CurrentProgress of 1.0.
trans-unit.target: Klokken som <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>har en CurrentProgress av 1.0.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>

trans-unit.source: Using a Timeline as a Timer A timeline's clock will only progress when there's an event hander associated with it or (in the case of an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> object) it is associated with a property.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av en tidslinje en tidtaker A tidslinje klokken vil bare fremdrift når en hendelse hendelsesbehandlingen tilknyttet eller (med en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>objektet) den er knyttet til en egenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: For this reason (and others), it's not recommended that you use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> as a timer.
trans-unit.target: For derfor (og andre) det anbefales at du bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>som en tidtaker.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this clock is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState"></xref>, or 0.0 if this clock is active and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline*> has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*> of <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever*>; otherwise, a value between 0.0 and 1.0 that indicates the current progress of this Clock within its current iteration.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>Hvis denne klokken <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState"> </xref>, eller 0,0 Hvis denne klokken er aktiv og <> </> *> har en <> </> *> av <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever*>; ellers en verdi mellom 0,0 og 1,0 som angir den gjeldende fremdriften for denne klokken i den gjeldende gjentakelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever*>

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.0 indicates no progress, and a value of 1.0 indicates that the clock is at the end of its current iteration.
trans-unit.target: Verdien 0,0 angir ingen pågår, og verdien 1.0 angir at klokken på slutten av den gjeldende gjentakelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the clock is currently <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om klokken er <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState"> </xref>, eller <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Note the clock's CurrentState property doesn't tell you whether it's paused.
trans-unit.target: Merk av klokken CurrentState egenskapen ikke fortelle deg om den er stoppet.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a clock is paused, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.IsPaused%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå om en klokken er midlertidig stoppet av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.IsPaused%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.IsPaused%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated> occurs whenever the value of this property changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>forekommer når verdien for denne egenskapen endres.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the clock: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende tilstanden til klokken: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState"> </xref>, eller <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState*> property is updated.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når klokken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState*>egenskapen er oppdatert.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState*>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> event when you want to be notified if when the clock starts, stops, or fills.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>hendelsen når du vil bli varslet om når klokken starter, stopper eller fyller.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> parameter of the <xref:System.EventHandler> event handler is the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> whose state was invalidated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>-parameteren for den <xref:System.EventHandler>hendelsesbehandling er den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>tilstand som ble gjort ugyldig.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.EventHandler> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Pausing a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> does not change its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Stans en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>endres ikke den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: To be notified when a clock becomes paused, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bli varslet når en klokken er satt på pause, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>

trans-unit.source: Although this event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> becomes invalid, that doesn't necessarily mean the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> changed: a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> that switches from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> and then back to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> in the same tick will cause this event to fire, but its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> property won't actually change.
trans-unit.target: Selv om denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>er ugyldig, som ikke nødvendigvis den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>endret: en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>som bytter fra <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>og deretter tilbake til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>i samme aksemerkene vil føre til at denne hendelsen til å starte, men den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A>egenskap, endres ikke faktisk.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets this clock's current time within its current iteration.
trans-unit.target: Henter denne klokken for gjeldende klokkeslett i den gjeldende gjentakelsen.

trans-unit.source: Using a Timeline as a Timer A timeline's clock will only progress when there's an event hander associated with it or (in the case of an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> object) it is associated with a property.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av en tidslinje en tidtaker A tidslinje klokken vil bare fremdrift når en hendelse hendelsesbehandlingen tilknyttet eller (med en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>objektet) den er knyttet til en egenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: For this reason (and others), it's not recommended that you use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> as a timer.
trans-unit.target: For derfor (og andre) det anbefales at du bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>som en tidtaker.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this clock is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState"></xref>; otherwise, the current time of this clock.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>Hvis denne klokken <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockState"> </xref>; ellers gjeldende klokkeslett i denne klokken.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime*> becomes invalid.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når denne klokken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime*>blir ugyldig.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, will be invoked whenever a clock repeats, skips, or seeks.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, vil aktiveres når en klokken gjentar, hopper over eller søker etter.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> has its own external time source, which may require synchronization with the timing system.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer om den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> har sine egne eksterne tidskilde, som kan kreve synkronisering med tidsberegning-systemet.

trans-unit.source: Media being played using <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline> within a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> is an example of creating a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> that would have an external time source (a video clip for example) which may require synchronization with other timelines within the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Mediet som spilles med <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline>i et <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>er et eksempel på hvordan du oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>vil som har en tidskilde med eksterne (en klipp for eksempel) med som kan kreve synkronisering med andre tidslinjer i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A> for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>for mer informasjon.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline.SlipBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns **true** if the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> has its own external source for time, which may require synchronization with the timing system; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer **true** hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> har sine egne ekstern kilde for tid, noe som kan kreve synkronisering med tidsberegning-systemet; ellers **false**.

trans-unit.source: Gets this clock's current time within its current iteration.
trans-unit.target: Henter denne klokken for gjeldende klokkeslett i den gjeldende gjentakelsen.

trans-unit.source: This method is used in the implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes i implementeringen av den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime%2A>metoden og skal ikke kalles direkte fra koden.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current time of this clock if it is active or filling; otherwise, <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende klokkeslett i denne klokken Hvis det er aktivt eller fyller; Ellers <xref:System.TimeSpan>.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> is part of a controllable clock tree.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> er en del av et kontrollert klokken tre.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this clock belongs to a clock tree with a controllable root clock or if this clock is itself a controllable root; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis denne klokken hører til et klokken tre med en kontrollert roten klokken eller denne klokken selve kontrollert rot. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref>, or any of its parents, is paused.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref>, eller noen av overordnede er midlertidig stanset.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> or any of its parents is paused; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> eller noen av overordnede er midlertidig stanset; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the natural duration of this clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter naturlig varigheten for denne klokken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about natural duration, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.GetNaturalDuration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om naturlig varighet, se den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.GetNaturalDuration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.GetNaturalDuration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The natural duration of this clock, as determined by its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline*>.
trans-unit.target: Naturlig varigheten for denne klokken, i henhold til den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Timeline*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the clock that is the parent of this clock.
trans-unit.target: Henter klokken som overordnet for denne klokken.

trans-unit.source: The parent of this clock or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this clock is a root.
trans-unit.target: Overordnet for denne klokken eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis denne klokken er en rot.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove*> method is called on this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> or one of its parent clocks.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove*>metoden kalles i denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> eller en av de overordnede klokkene.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, will be invoked whenever a clock begins, skips, pauses, resumes, or when the clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SpeedRatio*> is modified.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, aktiveres når en klokken starter, hopper over, stopper, gjenopptas, eller når klokken <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SpeedRatio*>er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.SpeedRatio*>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, will be invoked whenever a clock is stopped using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Stop*> method.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, vil bli startet når en klokken er stoppet ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Stop*>metode.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Stop*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the Timeline from which this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> was created.
trans-unit.target: Henter tidslinjen fra denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> ble opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Modifying a clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline> does not update the clock; a new clock must be created from the modified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>.
trans-unit.target: Endre en klokken <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline>ikke oppdatere klokken; må opprettes en ny klokken fra den endrede <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline>

trans-unit.source: The Timeline from which this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"></xref> was created.
trans-unit.target: Tidslinjen fra denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock"> </xref> ble opprettet.
